ZoomSettings.q1: Place these carcases in order from 1st to 4th
ZoomSettings.q2: 1. Which carcase has the most ossification?
ZoomSettings.q3: 2. Which carcase has the yellowest fat?
ZoomSettings.q4: 3. Which carcase has the fullest most muscular hind quarter?
ZoomSettings.q5: 4. Which carcase has the largest eye muscle?
ZoomSettings.q6: 5. Which carcase is the trimmest over the eye muscle?
ZoomSettings.q7: 6. Which carcase has the smallest eye muscle?
ZoomSettings.q8: 7. Which carcase is the fattest over the brisket?
ZoomSettings.q9: 8. Which is the narrowest, lightest muscled carcase?
ZoomSettings.q10: 9. Between 3 and 4 which is the leanest over the hind quarter?
ZoomSettings.q11: 10. Between 1 and 2 which is the fattest over the rump and loin?
